title: Henry Cow - In Praise of Learning
description:
Henry Cow - In Praise Of Learning 1975



This was the first Henry Cow I ever bought, the LP with the red boot.

Eventually I had them all, and would put those three &#039;boots&#039; on my wall, each in a transparent LP frame.

WishI stll had &#039;em.



Anyway, this can be a life-changing album if heard under proper circumstances.
Considered in the context of its time, over thirty years ago, astonishingly different- yet fearlessly so.

It is the first album to be co-credited with Slapp Happy, whose Dagmar Krause would later form the Art Bears with Frith and Cutler.


"Art is not a mirror, it is a hammer" the band quotes John Grierson.
